extText.message: Mitigates some of the design choices regarding Last.fm in the form of a handy options menu.

artistFirstRecent.message: Artist — Title song format in Recent Tracks chart

titleSpace.message: More space for song title in Recent Tracks chart

barColor.message: Change color of scrobble bar in charts

fontWeight.message: Regular font weight for song titles/artists

scrobbleText.message: Remove the word "scrobbles" from scrobble bar

artistFirstTop.message: Artist — Title song format in Top Tracks chart
